entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2 except minus 5 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2 except minus 5 inland. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
